repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript is a commentary on the Yajurveda. Although it is previously identified as commentary of Vidyāraṇya but actually is the commentary by Bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra. Folio broken around the edges hence folio numbers and some places text is lost. Some folio are worm eaten. Some folio have half blank lines at the middle of the sentence. Note on the front cover mentions : Yajurvedabhāṣya with Vidyāraṇya F. 246 7 l.

msItem.title: Vedārthaprakāśa
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭa Bhāskaramiśra
msItem.incipit: 2v 1 āsvantaḥ dravadravyeṣu madhye āsamantādada(3 syllables broken.) svādutvaṅdhārayti ta(one syllable broken.) sāmmadribhiḥ upāṃśubhavanaprabhṛtibhiḥ . pāṣāṇaissuṣāva yajamāno bhiddhṛta
msItem.explicit: 125r 9 va[rṣ]itva ya suvanārthau? (gap of 6 letters, space is left blank.) ayamabhiprāyaḥ (gap of 6 letters, space is left blank.) padārthaṃ sarveṣāṃ vastuānāmadhye pa (1 illegible syllable) lopyamāno dīrdhata (1 illegible syllable.) h̬at tiryak sat pya (3 illegible syllables.)
msItem.finalRubric: 125v 1 iti bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśraviracite vedārthaprakāśe dvitīyāṣṭakasya (gap of 2 letters due to damaged folio.) me prapāṭhake tamonuvākaḥ hariḥ oṃ śīvāyanamastu

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 3 blank folio and 124 written. Folio 1 is missing.

support.p: Thick palm leaf as cover guard.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin of the folio. Folio 1 is missing.
supportDesc.condition: Folio broken around the edges hence folio numbers and some places text is lost. Some folio are worm eaten. Some folio have half blank lines at the middle of the sentence.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittiriya saṃhitā of kṛṣṇayajurveda with the commentary of bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra Vol 4 kāṇḍa 2 praśnas 3-6 Edi. By A Mahādevaśāstri and Panditaratna K Raghavacarya Government Oriental Library Series, Bibliothica Sanskrit no. 9 Mysore Government Branch press 1896 .(Vol 1-10 available on archive org.)

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
2v 1 āsvantaḥ dravadravyeṣu madhye āsamantādada(3 syllables broken.) svādutvaṅdhārayti ta(one syllable broken.) sāmmadribhiḥ upāṃśubhavanaprabhṛtibhiḥ . pāṣāṇaissuṣāva yajamāno bhiddhṛta
125r 9 va[rṣ]itva ya suvanārthau? (gap of 6 letters, space is left blank.) ayamabhiprāyaḥ (gap of 6 letters, space is left blank.) padārthaṃ sarveṣāṃ vastuānāmadhye pa (1 illegible syllable) lopyamāno dīrdhata (1 illegible syllable.) h̬at tiryak sat pya (3 illegible syllables.)
125v 1 iti bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśraviracite vedārthaprakāśe dvitīyāṣṭakasya (gap of 2 letters due to damaged folio.) me prapāṭhake tamonuvākaḥ hariḥ oṃ śīvāyanamastu
